Name: blablacar-carpooling-and-bus
Title: Nice idea, many glitches though
Review: here is why this app is basically useless for me (yet, it's a general problem of blablacar as the website seems to have similar glitches): - you cannot change your location - you cannot change the language - you cannot change the currency. i mean, why?! someone either did not think at all, or spent way too much thinking on this app improving it to the worse i have a profile registered in germany. i am in mexico. the app assumes german time applied to mexico. thus, i cannot book a trip for today, because the app is telling me that a trip that is about to start in three hours has already begun. for example, it is 10 am mexican time, i found a ride for 1 pm mexican time, now the system internally adds 7 hours and assumes it is 5 pm mexican time. it doesn't display this time - and since this glitch is inconsistent - still shows all trips based on mexican time. hence, i see all trips but cannot book any that starts within the next seven hours. - yes, this is a bummer! :( particularly, since a driver didn't show up, and i desperately needed another trip asap. (by the way, i only figured out that this was the problem because the system added these seven hours to all the messages i sent to the driver. a message that i sent at 11:12 am was shown as sent at 6:12 pm) anyway, to find a way around this problem, i wanted to set up another profile with an appropriate time zone. yet, blablacar isn't available in the us so the .com domain is forwarded to their uk-website. setting up a profile in the uk, would have caused the same glitch however, i was able to setup another profile on their mexican website, but i struggled a lot because don't speak spanish and couldn't change the language. that, again, makes this app basically useless for me. however, now i saw the appropriate trips and with these many different mexican prices that were automatically changed to euro beforehand. yet, every driver in mexico wants to get paid in pesos. therefore, i would not be able to know how much a trip actually costs. these three issues - particularly in combination - are so ridiculous that i am wondering whether the people who have caused them actually get paid for their work. i mean, come on? something like that cannot even happen automatically, so i guess that this all is based on a few interns wanting to do a great job yet failing miserably i'd appreciate you'd sort these things out and make this app work for international travellers as well. thank you.
Negative keywords: useless, glitches, cannot change location, cannot change currency, spent way too much thinking, cannot book trip, not display time, see trips but cannot book, bummer, driver not show up,
